sentences.sContent: The smoky, tangy flavor associated with gutter oil can do wonders to simple, everyday dishes.
sentences.sContent_eng: The smoky, tangy flavor associated with gutter oil can do wonders to simple, everyday dishes.
sentences.sCn: 用地沟油做成的菜香气扑鼻，能使简单的家常菜拥有意想不到的味道。

sentences.sContent: I loved the smell of cork grease and slide oil, of musty woolen uniforms, and the tangy dankness of brassy horn bells.
sentences.sContent_eng: I loved the smell of cork grease and slide oil, of musty woolen uniforms, and the tangy dankness of brassy horn bells.
sentences.sCn: 我喜欢闻松脂和黑色润滑油味道，喜欢闻羊毛制服的霉味和潮湿的黄铜喇叭的扑鼻气味。

synos.tran: 扑鼻的；有刺激性的；强烈的

words.tran: 发出铿锵声；发出当的一声

trans.tranCn: 气味刺激的， 扑鼻的
